Person.Organization: H. LEE MOFFITT CANCER CTR & RES INSTAMERICAN ASSOCIATION FOR CANCER RESEARCH

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: FOCI: Funding Support for the Follow-up of Ovarian Cancer Genetic Association and Interaction Studies (FOCI) was provided through the National Cancer Institute’s Cancer Post-GWAS Initiative, Genetic Associations and Mechanisms in Oncology (GAME-ON) (U19-CA148112). Acknowledgments and funding follow for the specific sub-studies within FOCI. GWAS Meta-Analysis: Funding Support for the Follow-up of Ovarian Cancer Genetic Association and Interaction Studies (FOCI) was provided through the National Cancer Institute’s Cancer Post-GWAS Initiative, Genetic Associations and Mechanisms in Oncology (GAME-ON) (U19-CA148112). The genotyping, bioinformatics, and biostatistical analysis for MAY, NCO, and TOR were supported by R01-CA114343 and R01-CA114343-S1. The MAY study is supported by R01-CA122443, P50-CA136393, and funding from the Mayo Foundation. The NCO study is supported by R01-CA76016. The TBO study is supported by R01-CA106414, the American Cancer Society (CRTG-00-196-01-CCE), and the Advanced Cancer Detection Center Grant, Department of Defense (DAMD-17-98-1-8659). The TOR study is supported by grants from the Canadian Cancer Society and the NIH (R01-CA63682 and R01-CA63678). The Mayo Clinic Genotyping Shared Resource is supported by the National Cancer Institute (P30-CA15083). The BWH study is supported by grants R01-CA54419 and P50-CA105009. The POL study was supported by the Intramural Research Program of the NIH, National Cancer Institute, Division of Cancer Epidemiology and Genetics, and the Center for Cancer Research. The SEA study is funded by a program grant from Cancer Research UK. The UKO study is supported by funding from Cancer Research UK, the Eve Appeal, and the OAK Foundation; some of this work was undertaken at UCLH/UCL who received some funding from the Department of Health’s NIHR Biomedical Research Centre funding scheme. UK genotyping and data analysis were supported by a project grant from Cancer Research UK. UK studies also make use of data generated by the Wellcome Trust Case-Control Consortium. A list of investigators who contributed to the generation of data is available at www.wtccc.org.uk. Affymetrix Exome Chip: Funding Support for the Follow-up of Ovarian Cancer Genetic Association and Interaction Studies (FOCI) was provided through the National Cancer Institute’s Cancer Post-GWAS Initiative, Genetic Associations and Mechanisms in Oncology (GAME-ON) (U19-CA148112). The SWH study is supported by grants R37CA070867 and UM1CA182910. Mayo 2.5M Chip: Funding Support for the Follow-up of Ovarian Cancer Genetic Association and Interaction Studies (FOCI) was provided through the National Cancer Institute’s Cancer Post-GWAS Initiative, Genetic Associations and Mechanisms in Oncology (GAME-ON) (U19-CA148112). The MAY study is supported by R01-CA122443 and the Mayo Foundation. Mayo OmniExpress: Funding Support for the Follow-up of Ovarian Cancer Genetic Association and Interaction Studies (FOCI) was provided through the National Cancer Institute’s Cancer Post-GWAS Initiative, Genetic Associations and Mechanisms in Oncology (GAME-ON) (U19-CA148112). The MAC study is supported by R01-CA122443 and the Mayo Foundation.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Ovarian Cancer, NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OVCA-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Ovarian Cancer. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Ovarian Cancer, MDS, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OVCA-MDS-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Ovarian Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms). Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Ovarian Cancer, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OVCA-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Ovarian Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Ovarian Cancer)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OVCA
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Ovarian Cancer.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Ovarian Cancer, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OVCA-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Ovarian Cancer. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Breast, Ovarian, or Endometrial Disease, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BOED-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Breast, Ovarian, or Endometrial Disease. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Breast Cancer, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BRCA-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Breast Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Cancer.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (COL)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-COL
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).
A blank copy of the letter of collaboration for this study can be found at the end of the study’s Data Use Certification Agreement (see dbGaP study page). Requestor must provide this signed form documenting approval. Approval can be obtained by contacting Dr. Keitaro Matsuo at kmatsuo@aichi-cc.jp.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Ovarian Tumors)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OVTU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Ovarian Tumors.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (PUB, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-PUB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Ovarian Cancer Only
ConsentGroup.name: OVCARES
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is restricted to ovarian cancer studies only. General methods development research is NOT permitted.
